title: Lucy Lawless
summary: Lucille Frances Lawless MNZM (née Ryan; born 29 March 1968) is a New Zealand actress and singer. She is best known for her role as the title character in the television series Xena: Warrior Princess, but also portrayed the News Reporter D'Anna Biers on the re-imagined Battlestar Galactica series and Lucretia in the television series Spartacus: Blood and Sand and associated series.
